rows.label: qst006001_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, is this a stone tablet?
...It doesn't seem to be
that old, does it?

rows.label: qst006001_msg0002
rows.name:
The people of Luxuria once built
their dwellings on the Genbu Drifts.

rows.label: qst006001_msg0006
rows.name: All there is? What do you mean?

rows.label: qst006001_msg0007
rows.name:
The stone tablet is broken,
so I don't know the rest.

rows.label: qst006001_msg0008
rows.name:
So if we want to know the
rest, we have to find the
missing pieces of this tablet.

rows.label: qst006001_msg0009
rows.name:
According to the shopkeeper,
this tablet was found near
the Genbu Drifts.

rows.label: qst006001_msg0011
rows.name:
What will I do? That should
be obvious, shouldn't it?

rows.label: qst006001_msg0012
rows.name:
We will go and search for
it, wherever it may be!

rows.label: qst006001_msg0013
rows.name:
And when we have gathered all the pieces
of the tablet, we will return here to
examine it. Understood, my retainers?
